attributes.description:
2016 TOYOTA PRADO, 148783 KM, WHITE with BLACK.

60079404
  All available records show the odometer reading on this vehicle to be accurate. There is not a skip or slip, just pure smoothness in this vehicle's transmission. The vehicle engine runs very, very smooth. This vehicle's exterior is very clean. This is a very well maintained vehicle with a clean interior. You should feel good with at least 75% of tire wear left on this set of rubber.

attributes.description:
KIA SELTOS 1.6 AT EX+ MY21
Beautiful Seltos in excellent condition. Black 2021 model. Full service history. Central locking, airbags, aircon, electric windows and mirrors. Radio with bluetooth and USB port. Reverse camera and rear sensors to assist with parking. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Full Maintenance plan. Automatic transmission that allows you to drive in comfort and in style. Come and visit the KIA Konfidence dealership in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book a test drive. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.description:
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Kia Northcliff offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages.

Kia Konfidence is backed by Kia Motors South Africa, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery.

You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Kia Financial Services. Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today.
